titlestmt.titleproper: Rosove (Michael H.) collection of South with Scott editions
Finding Aid for the Michael H. Rosove collection of South with Scott editions LSC.2313
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Kelly Besser, 2021.

p.date: Online finding aid last updated 2021 January 11.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-11 10:45:50 -0800.

did.unittitle: Michael H. Rosove collection of South with Scott editions

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. All requests to access special collections materials must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of 80 editions of Edward R. G. R. Evans' work, titled South with Scott, collected by Dr. Michael H. Rosove for his bibliography titled Antarctica, 1772-1922 (Freestanding Publications through 1999 (Adélie Books, 2001) and Supplement to the Rosove Antarctic Bibliography (Adélie Books, 2007).
